  • Classes in org.drip.numerical.matrix used by org.drip.measure.crng
    Class Description
    R1SquareEigenized
    R1SquareEigenized implements an R1 Square Matrix with its Pre-computed Eigen-values and Eigen-vectors.
    R1Triangular
    R1Triangular implements the type and Functionality associated with an R1 Triangular Matrix.

    R1SquareRotation2x2 implements the 2x2 R1 Square Rotation Matrix parameterized by theta.
